description: Autograph. Jumādá I, 1060H. The work, in 4 bābs, was completed in 1060H. Incip.: ... ىا مالك الاملاك لىس لى سواك ... و بعد فقد رغب الىّ من هو عزىز على ان اجمع له نبذة ... فى احکام المسواك
author: ʻUṭayfī, Ramaḍān ibn Mūsá.
creator: ʻUṭayfī, Ramaḍān ibn Mūsá.
subject: Teeth—Care and hygiene—Religious aspects—Islam—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
